item.title: Lython
item.description: Modified: July 19 2024 Lython is my final project for my Masters program. I based it off an idea I had of giving my students a filtered AI, which branched off into editing ChatGPT with prompt filtering. Seeing that alone was particularly easy, I looked into implementing RAG, which works kind of. Github I’d like to continue working on my project as an actual tool to use during class. I’d like to be able to launch it to a production server, so my students can access it during class.
